title: LF silver duo
body: {{champion:119}} Hi there summoners im currently looking for a low silver duo to hopefully climb back to gold im really easily to get along with. I main adc (draven) :p but can play every role i always play serious and try my best add zerkz if your keen :)

replies.body: Hey Man, Im down. Ill support Ya on {{champion:89}}  :)
Hey I'm keen to duo I was silver 2 last season and I play a mean ass thresh and morgana, I'll add you tonight. :)
